name: MAGIC ITEM (3): SUN SPHERE
description:
Inspired artisans of XOTHIQUE will make this 'sun sphere' about 8,000 years from now - using magic and intra-molecular casting, a semi-magical scientific process that captures radiant cosmic energy in the micro-gravity fields between certain inert elements - energized at the plasma level.

It will likely be used as a portable light and heat source for thieves and adventuring parties seeking relics or adventure in the ruins of cities such as Kammorium, Yon-Vohbis, or Zaccourath. 

Many believe that a properly forged and enchanted 'sun-sphere' can protect it's holder from negative entities such as vault-weavers, face leeches, and even on occasion -- 'shoggoths'.

This digital "token" confers upon you
a portion of the aesthetic and para-natural
power of this radiant meta-object.

Think on the maker of this physical item
and send them your gratitude forward
through the centuries - for the
privilege of holding it's present day
meta-verse avatar.

My future-self took this photo and was blessed
by this object and the sincere
expression of it's maker.

I truly hope my photo gives a portion
of that warmth and comfort to you.

HPL
